Why are you treating a guest that way?

We were just

joking around.

Ha ha ha!

They said

they were just

playing around.

Um, okay… Hey, watch it with that gun!

Darwin remained in Shropshire

for a while and became acquainted

with Fanny Owen, the daughter of

a prestigious family.

You really are

a good shooter.

But you’re much better than I am, Hee hee.

I’m so glad I decided

to come here. I was

able to meet you.

Me too,

Charles.


35
